content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (x=53.0, y=-83.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=53.0, y=-83.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=52.5, y=-84.5)

### Copper Ore Mining and Transportation System at Position (x=-25.0, y=-64.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-25.0, y=-64.0)
- Transport Belt group connecting positions (x=-25.5, y=-65.5) to (x=-21.5, y=-65.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-21.5, y=-65.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Storage Facility at Position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-54.5)

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-19.0, y=-65.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (x=0.0, y=0.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (x=2.5, y=0.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=1.5, y=0.5)

### Belt Transportation Network
- Belt Group from (x=-26.5, y=-65.5) to (x=-22.5, y=-65.5)
- Belt Group from (x=-23.5, y=-64.5) to (x=-21.5, y=-64.5)
- Belt Group from (x=-20.5, y=-64.5) to (x=-20.5, y=-66.5)
- Belt Group from (x=-14.5, y=-54.5) to (x=-17.5, y=-59.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when accessing entities at non-existent positions
- Verify the existence of an entity at a specified position before attempting to access it.

### TypeError due to missing arguments in function calls
- Ensure that all required arguments are provided when calling functions, especially when dealing with positional arguments.
